# Ellipsize with style

Pretty reducing huge Python objects to visualise them nicely.

Handy for AWS outputs etc.

# Documentation

[ellipsize](https://andgineer.github.io/ellipsize/)

# Developers

Do not forget to run `. ./activate.sh`.
